title: AlgoThereum
author: AlgoThereum
content: Hello Everyone, I’m looking for programmers who want to focus on the stablecoin area of the AlgoThereum Foundation. It’s called zkDOLLAR and its a financial design I started working on at the end of 2020. If you are interested in developing an Algorithmic Stablecoin which will serve the purpose for liquidity pool settlements, please contact me for further details.Thanks,Team AlgoThereum algothereum@gmail.com
